item.title: Splat A Sloth - Great Working! Guaranteed High Score!
item.dc:creator: @dragonmasterscott dragonmasterscott
item.description:
@dragonmasterscott wrote:

Hey guys im kinda new to the whole scripting thing. Tell me how I did in this one! And if this works im releasing the one for Kass Basher next. I already got Silver from that! Heres Splat a Sloth…

/////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// Splat-A-Slot //
// by dragonmasterscott //
// //
// 1. Specify game client //
// 2. Run the script //
// //
// Good Luck Splating //
/////////////////////////////////////////////////////
program SplatASloth_v2;
var x,y:integer;
begin
clickmouse(260,303,true);
wait(2000);
repeat
wait(100);
until(findcolor(x,y,74,150,40,160,50));
repeat
wait(1);
until(not(findcolor(x,y,74,150,40,155,45)));
keydown(32);
wait(30);
keyup(32);
writeln(‘Splat!’)
end.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 07, 2009, 10:55:44 pm[/size][hr]Just copy and paste that into SCAR. Then drag the crosshair over to the game and click Play Script. It usually scores higher when the game size it on Regular! Please tell me how I did!

Read full topic
item.source: Splat A Sloth - Great Working! Guaranteed High Score!
